properties.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Eastern Franklin; Grand Isle; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Eastern Clinton; Western Clinton; Western Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Orleans; Essex
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 3:01AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing rain possible. Ice accumulations of a half
inch up to one inch possible, with the highest amounts expected
in the St. Lawrence Valley of New York.

* WHERE...The St. Lawrence Valley, the northern Champlain Valley,
and far north-central into northeastern Vermont.

* WHEN...Freezing rain is expected Saturday night into Sunday
morning, and may be moderate to heavy at times. Precipitation
may end as a brief period of snow Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Expect scattered to widespread power outages and tree
damage due to the ice. Travel could be very difficult Saturday
night into Sunday owing to icy roads.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
